text: The Truth About Love is the sixth studio album by American singer-songwriter Pink. There were six singles from it. It was released on September 14, 2012 . The record's songs are about love, monogamy, and sexuality, as mentioned in the album's title. This is because she gave birth to her first child in 2011 in prior to the release of the album. title: The Truth About Love
